sentences.sContent: They are then taken back to the slaughterhouse, where workers cull them and excise their livers.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are then taken back to the slaughterhouse, where workers cull them and excise their livers.
sentences.sCn: 然后它们会被送回屠宰场，那里的工人会进行精选，并切除它们的肝脏。

remMethod.val: 斗牛用的公牛 (bull) 要精选 (cull)

trans.tranOther: to kill animals so that there are not too many of them, or so that a disease does not spread
